Method.name: LoadDocument
GetParentSourceId
Method.Implementation: set tExternalId = $system.iKnow.GetExternalId(..%GetDomainName(), pSourceId) quit:tExternalId="" "" set tParagraphID = $piece(tExternalId,":",*), tParentID = "" &SQL(SELECT Parent->ID INTO :tParentID FROM Demo_RulesBuilder.Paragraph WHERE ID = :tParagraphID) quit:SQLCODE "" set tDocumentName = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetValue(..%GetDomainId(), "DocumentName", tExternalId) quit $system.iKnow.GetSourceId(..%GetDomainName(), ":SQL:"_tDocumentName_":"_tParentID)

Method.name: GetDocumentName
Method.Implementation: set tFieldId = ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetFieldId(..%GetDomainId(), "DocumentName") quit:'tFieldId "" quit ##class(%iKnow.Queries.MetadataAPI).GetValueById(..%GetDomainId(), tFieldId, pSourceId)

XData.name: Domain
XData.Data:
<domain name="RulesBuilder Paragraphs" disabled="false" allowCustomUpdates="true"> <parameter name="DefaultConfig" value="RulesBuilder Paragraphs.Configuration" isList="false" /> <parameter name="$$$IKPMATSKIPRELATIONS" value="0" /> <data dropBeforeBuild="false"> <!--table listname="Table_1" batchMode="true" disabled="false" listerClass="%iKnow.Source.SQL.Lister" tableName="Demo_RulesBuilder.Paragraph" idField="FullKey" groupField="DocumentName" dataFields="FullTextContents" metadataColumns="DocumentName" metadataFields="DocumentName" /--> </data> <metadata> <field name="DocumentName" operators="=" dataType="STRING" storage="1" caseSensitive="false" disabled="false" /> <field name="FullKey" operators="=" dataType="STRING" storage="1" caseSensitive="false" disabled="false" /> <field name="SomeOperators" operators="=,<" /> <field name="MoreOperators" operators="ALL" /> </metadata> <configuration name="RulesBuilder Paragraphs.Configuration" detectLanguage="false" languages="en" summarize="true" maxConceptLength="0" />
<matching dropBeforeBuild="false" defaultProfile="ZeroThresholds">
<profile name="ZeroThresholds" minimalMatchScore="0.01" relationshipScoreMultiplier="1" />
<dictionary name="Base rules"> <item name="lending" uri=":trading:lending"> <term string="lending " /> </item> <item name="may purchase" uri=":rule:may-purchase"> <term string="may purchase" /> <term string="may invest" /> <term string="may hold" /> <term string="may purchase or hold" /> </item> <item name="permitted" uri=":trading:permitted"> <term string="permitted" /> </item> <item name="prohibited" uri=":trading:prohibited"> <term string="prohibited" /> </item> <item name="allowed" uri=":trading:allowed"> <term string="allowed" /> </item> <item name="portfolio composed of" uri=":rule:composed-of" > <term string="portfolio will be composed of" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Reporting"> <item name="written approval" uri=":rule:written approval"> <term string="designating in writing" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Flags"> <item name="only" uri=":flags:only"> <term string="only" /> </item> <item name="unless" uri=":flags:unless"> <term string="unless" /> </item> <item name="other" uri=":flags:other"> <term string="other" /> </item> <item name="including" uri=":flags:including"> <term string="including" /> </item> <item name="excluding" uri=":flags:excluding"> <term string="excluding" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Logic" > <item name="excluding" uri=":logic:excluding"> <term string="excluding" /> <term string="exclusive" /> <term string="excl" /> </item> <item name="including" uri=":logic:including"> <term string="including" /> <term string="inclusive" /> <term string="incl" /> </item> <item name="greater than" uri=":logic:greater-than"> <term string="greater than" /> <term string="minimum" /> <term string="more than" /> <term string="min" /> <term string="at least" /> <term string="above" /> </item> <item name="less than" uri=":logic:less-than"> <term string="at most" /> <term string="less than" /> <term string="maximum" /> <term string="max" /> <term string="up to" /> <term string="u p t o" /> <term string="below" /> </item> <item name="between" uri=":logic:between"> <term string="between" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Numerics"> <item name="percentage" uri=":num:percentage"> <format formatClass="%iKnow.Matching.Formats.RegularExpression" formatParams="(.*[^0-9])?([0-9\.]+) ?%.*,$2%" /> </item> <!--item name="rating" uri=":num:rating"> <format formatClass="%iKnow.Matching.Formats.RegularExpression" formatParams="(.*[^abcd])?([abcd]+[0123]?).*,$2" /> </item--> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Other"> <item name="rated at" uri=":other:rated"> <term string="rated at" /> <term string="rated" /> <term string="rating" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Rating"> <item name="rated AAA" uri=":rating:aaa"> <term string="AAA" /> </item> <item name="rated AA" uri=":rating:aa"> <term string="AA" /> <term string="AA1" /> <term string="AA2" /> <term string="AA3" /> </item> <item name="rated A" uri=":rating:a"> <term string="A" /> <term string="A1" /> <term string="A2" /> <term string="A3" /> <term string="A-1" /> <term string="A-2" /> <term string="A-3" /> </item> <item name="rated BAA" uri=":rating:baa"> <term string="BAA" /> <term string="BAA1" /> <term string="BAA2" /> <term string="BAA3" /> </item> <item name="rated BBB" uri=":rating:bbb"> <term string="BBB" /> </item> <item name="rated BA" uri=":rating:ba"> <term string="BA" /> <term string="BA1" /> <term string="BA2" /> <term string="BA3" /> </item> <item name="rated BB" uri=":rating:bb"> <term string="BB" /> </item> <item name="rated B" uri=":rating:b"> <term string="B" /> <term string="B1" /> <term string="B2" /> <term string="B3" /> </item> <item name="rated CAA" uri=":rating:caa"> <term string="CAA" /> <term string="CAA1" /> <term string="CAA2" /> <term string="CAA3" /> </item> <item name="rated CCC" uri=":rating:ccc"> <term string="CCC" /> </item> <item name="rated CA" uri=":rating:ca"> <term string="CA" /> </item> <item name="rated CC" uri=":rating:cc"> <term string="CC" /> </item> <item name="rated C" uri=":rating:c"> <term string="C" /> </item> <item name="rated D" uri=":rating:d"> <term string="D" /> </item> <item name="rated R" uri=":rating:r"> <term string="R" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Instruments"> <item name="ARS" uri=":instr:ARS"> <term string="auction rate securities" /> <term string="ARS" /> </item> <item name="bank trust preferred" uri=":instr:bank-trust-preferred"> <term string="bank trust preferred" /> </item> <item name="bonds" uri=":instr:bonds"> <term string="bonds" /> </item> <item name="cash" uri=":instr:cash"> <term uri=":instr:commodities"> <term string="commodities" /> </item> <item name="convertible bonds" uri=":instr:convertible-bonds"> <term string="convertible bonds" /> </item> <item name="convertible name="direct real estate" uri=":instr:direct-real-estate"> <term string="direct real estate" /> </item> <item name="equities" uri=":isntr:equities"> <term string="equities" /> </item> <item name="futures" uri=":instr:futures"> <term string="futures" /> </item> <item name="high yield" uri=":instr:high-yield"> <term string="high yield" /> </item> <item name="manager guidelines" uri=":logic:manager-guidelines"> <term string="manager guidelines" /> </item> <item name="mortgage derivatives" uri=":instr:mortgate-derivatives"> <term string="mortgage derivatives" /> </item> <item Repo" uri=":instr:reverse-repo"> <term string="reverse repurchase agreements" /> <term string="Reverse Repos" /> </item> <item name="Rule 144A" uri=":instr:Rule-144A"> <term string="Rule-144A" /> string="securites with registration rights" /> </item> <item name="shares" uri=":instr:shares"> <term string="shares" /> </item> <item name="stocks" uri=":instr:stocks"> <term string="stocks" /> <term string="stock" /> </item> <item name="swaps" uri=":instr:swaps"> <term string="swaps" /> </item> <item name="swaptions" uri=":instr:swaptions"> <term string="swaptions" /> </item> <item name="VRDNs" uri=":instr:vrdns"> <term string="variable rate demand notes" /> <term string="VRDNs" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Industries"> <item name="industry group" uri=":org:industry-group"> <term string="industry group" /> <term string="industry subgroup" /> </item> <item name="insurer" uri=":org:insurer"> <term string="insurance" /> <term string="insurer" /> <term string="life" /> <term string="health" /> <term string="healthy" /> <term string="property and casualty" /> </item> <item name="alcohol" uri=":org:alcohol"> <term string="alcohol" /> <term string="Brewery" /> <term string="wine" /> <term string="spirits" /> </item> <item name="borrower" uri=":org:borrower"> <term string="borrower" /> <term string="borrowers" /> </item> <item name="reinsurer" uri=":org:reinsurer"> <term string="reinsurer" /> <term string="reinsurers" /> </item> <item name="tobacco companies" uri=":org:tobacco"> <term string="tobacco companies" /> <term string="tobacco" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Organizations"> <item name="company" uri=":org:company"> <term string="company" /> <term string="companies" /> </item> <item name="client" uri=":org:client"> <term string="client" /> </item> <item name="issue" uri=":org:issue"> <term string="issue" /> </item> <item name="issuers" uri=":org:issuers"> <term string="issuers" /> </item> <item name="manager" uri=":org:manager"> <term string="manager" /> <term string="investment manager" /> </item> <item name="party" uri=":org:party"> <term string="party" /> </item> <item name="public" uri=":org:public"> <term string="public" /> </item> <item name="rating agency" uri=":org:rating"> <term string="Moody" /> <term string="Standard and Poor" /> <term string="Standard and Poor's" /> <term string="Standard & Poor" /> <term string="Standard & Poor's" /> </item> <item name="restricted issuers" uri=":org:restricted-issuers"> <term string="restricted issuers" /> </item> <item name="US government" uri=":org:usgov"> <term string="US government" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Account types"> <item name="mid cap equity portfolio" uri=":acct:mid-cap-equity-portfolio"> <term string="mid cap equity portfolio" /> </item> <item name="money market account" uri=":acct:money-market"> <term string="money-market account" /> <term string="money market account" /> </item> <item name="money market sweep account" uri=":acct:money-market-sweep"> <term string="money-market sweep account" /> <term string="money market sweep account" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Trading"> <item name="ATOP" uri=":trading:atop"> <term string="ATOP" /> <term string="at the time of purchase" /> </item> <item name="buy" uri=":trading:buy"> <term string="buy" /> <term string="buying" /> </item> <item name="downgrade" uri=":trading:downgrade"> <term string="downgrade" /> </item> <item name="held" uri=":trading:held"> <term string="held " /> </item> <item name="liquidated" uri=":trading:liquidated"> <term string="liquidated" /> </item> <item name="long position" uri=":trading:long-position"> <term string="long position" /> </item> <item name="on margin" uri=":trading:on-margin"> <term string="on margin" /> </item> <item name="maturity" uri=":trading:maturity"> <term string="maturity" /> </item> <item name="sell" uri=":trading:sell"> <term string="sell" /> <term string="selling" /> </item> <item name="short position" uri=":trading:short-position"> <term string="short position" /> </item> <item name="short sale" uri=":trading:short-sale"> <term string="short sale" /> </item> </dictionary>
<dictionary name="Measure"> <item name="market value" uri=":measure:mv"> <term string="market value" /> <term string="current market value" /> </item> <item name="account market value" uri=":measure:mv-acc"> <term string="market value of account" /> </item> <item name="US Dollars" uri=":measure:USD"> <term string="US Dollars" /> <term string="USD Currency" /> </item> <item name="quality" uri=":measure:quality"> <term string="quality" /> </item> <item name="one year" uri=":measure:one-year"> <term string="1 year" /> <term string="one year" /> </item> <item name="outstanding shares" uri=":measure:outstanding-shares"> <term string="outstanding shares" /> </item> </dictionary> </matching>
</domain>
